cellHintEnabled.Description: Enables a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over a cell with truncated content.

columnAutoWidth.Description: Specifies whether columns should adjust their widths to the content.

allowSearch.Description: Specifies whether searching is enabled in the column chooser.

emptyPanelText.Description: Specifies text displayed by the column chooser when it is empty.

enabled.Description: Specifies whether a user can open the column chooser.

height.Description: Specifies the height of the column chooser.

mode.Description: Specifies how a user manages columns using the column chooser.

title.Description: Specifies the title of the column chooser.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the column chooser.

enabled.Description: Enables column fixing.

texts.Description: Contains options that specify texts for column fixing commands in the context menu of a column header.

fix.Description: Specifies text for the context menu item that fixes a column.

leftPosition.Description: Specifies text for the context menu subitem that fixes a column to the left edge of the widget.

rightPosition.Description: Specifies text for the context menu subitem that fixes a column to the right edge of the widget.

unfix.Description: Specifies text for the context menu item that unfixes a column.

columnHidingEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget should hide columns to adapt to the screen or container size. Ignored if allowColumnResizing is true and columnResizingMode is "widget".

columnMinWidth.Description: Specifies the minimum width of columns.

columnResizingMode.Description: Specifies how the widget resizes columns. Applies only if allowColumnResizing is true.

columnWidth.Description: Specifies the width for all data columns. Has a lower priority than the column.width option.

customizeColumns.Description: Specifies a function that customizes grid columns after they are created.

customizeExportData.Description: Customizes grid columns and data before exporting.

dataSource.Description: Specifies the origin of data for the widget.

dateSerializationFormat.Description: Specifies date-time values' serialization format. Use it only if you do not specify the dataSource at design time.

disabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget responds to user interaction.

allowAdding.Description: Specifies whether a user can add new rows.

allowDeleting.Description: Specifies whether a user can delete rows.

allowUpdating.Description: Specifies whether a user can update rows.

form.Description: Configures the form. Used only if editing.mode is "form" or "popup".

mode.Description: Specifies how a user edits data.

popup.Description: Configures the popup. Used only if editing.mode is "popup".

texts.Description: Contains options that specify texts for editing-related UI elements.

addRow.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user pauses on the global "Add" button. Applies only if editing.allowAdding is true.

cancelAllChanges.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user pauses on the "Discard" button. Applies only if editing.mode is "batch".

cancelRowChanges.Description: Specifies text for a button that cancels changes in a row. Applies only if editing.allowUpdating is true and editing.mode is "row".

confirmDeleteMessage.Description: Specifies a message that prompts a user to confirm deletion.

confirmDeleteTitle.Description: Specifies a title for the window that asks a user to confirm deletion.

deleteRow.Description: Specifies text for buttons that delete rows. Applies only if allowDeleting is true.

editRow.Description: Specifies text for buttons that switch rows into the editing state. Applies only if allowUpdating is true.

saveAllChanges.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user pauses on the global "Save" button. Applies only if editing.mode is "batch".

saveRowChanges.Description: Specifies text for a button that saves changes made in a row. Applies only if allowUpdating is true.

undeleteRow.Description: Specifies text for buttons that recover deleted rows. Applies only if allowDeleting is true and editing.mode is "batch".

validationCancelChanges.Description: Specifies text for a hint appearing when a user pauses on the button that cancels changes in a cell. Applies only if editing.mode is "cell" and data validation is enabled.

useIcons.Description: Specifies whether the editing column uses icons instead of links.

elementAttr.Description: Specifies the attributes to be attached to the widget's root element.

errorRowEnabled.Description: Indicates whether to show the error row.

allowExportSelectedData.Description: Allows an end user to export selected rows only.

enabled.Description: Enables the client-side exporting.

excelFilterEnabled.Description: Specifies whether to enable Excel filtering for the exported data in the resulting XLSX file.

excelWrapTextEnabled.Description: Specifies whether to enable word wrapping for the exported data in the resulting XLSX file.

fileName.Description: Specifies a default name for the file to which grid data is exported.

ignoreExcelErrors.Description: Specifies whether Excel should hide warnings if there are errors in the exported document.

proxyUrl.Description: Specifies the URL of the server-side proxy that streams the resulting file to the end user to enable exporting in the Safari browser.

exportAll.Description: Specifies the text of the command that exports all data.

exportSelectedRows.Description: Specifies the text of the drop-down menu command that exports selected rows.

exportTo.Description: Specifies the hint of the Export button when the allowExportSelectedData option is true.

groupContinuesMessage.Description: Specifies the message displayed in a group row when the corresponding group continues on the next page.

ungroupAll.Description: Specifies the text of the context menu item that clears grouping settings of all columns.

allowSearch.Description: Specifies whether searching is enabled in the header filter.

cancel.Description: Specifies text for the button that closes the popup menu without applying a filter.

emptyValue.Description: Specifies a name for the item that represents empty values in the popup menu.

ok.Description: Specifies text for the button that applies the specified filter.

visible.Description: Indicates whether header filter icons are visible.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the popup menu that contains values for filtering.

hint.Description: Specifies text for a hint that appears when a user pauses on the widget.

hoverStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the widget changes its state when a user pauses on it.

keyExpr.Description: Specifies which data field provides keys for data items. Applies only if data is a simple array.

enabled.Description: Specifies whether to show the load panel or not.

height.Description: Specifies the height of the load panel in pixels.

indicatorSrc.Description: Specifies a URL pointing to an image to be used as a loading indicator.

showIndicator.Description: Specifies whether to show the loading indicator.

showPane.Description: Specifies whether to show the pane of the load panel.

text.Description: Specifies text displayed on the load panel.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the load panel in pixels.

enabled.Description: Enables an end-user to expand/collapse detail sections.

onOptionChanged.Description: A handler for the optionChanged event. Executed after an option of the widget is changed.

grouping.Description: Specifies whether or not grouping must be performed on the server side.

The Funnel widget conveys information using different interactive elements (tooltips, labels, legend) and enables you to create not only a funnel, but also a pyramid chart.

dxPivotGridFieldChooser.Description: A complementary widget for the PivotGrid that allows you to manage data displayed in the PivotGrid. The field chooser is already integrated in the PivotGrid and can be invoked using the context menu. If you need to continuously display the field chooser near the PivotGrid widget, use the PivotGridFieldChooser widget.

activeStateEnabled.Description: Specifies whether or not the widget changes its state when interacting with a user.

ChartCommonSeriesSettings.Description: Specifies settings common for all series in the chart.

aggregation.Description: Configures data aggregation for the series.

calculate.Description: Specifies a custom aggregate function. Applies only if the aggregation method is "custom".

enabled.Description: Enables data aggregation for the series.

method.Description: Specifies how to aggregate series points.

area.Description: Defines common settings for all area series.

argumentField.Description: Specifies which data source field provides arguments for series points.

axis.Description: Binds the series to a value axis.

bar.Description: Defines common settings for all bar series.

barPadding.Description: Controls the padding and consequently the width of all bars in a series using relative units. Ignored if the barWidth option is set.

barWidth.Description: Specifies a fixed width for all bars in a series, measured in pixels. Takes precedence over the barPadding option.

border.Description: Configures the series border (in area-like series) or the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series).

color.Description: Colors the series border (in area-like series) or the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series).

dashStyle.Description: Sets a dash style for the series border (in area-like series) or for the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series).

visible.Description: Shows the series border (in area-like series) or the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series).

width.Description: Sets a pixel-measured width for the series border (in area-like series) or for the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series).

bubble.Description: Defines common settings for all bubble series.

candlestick.Description: Defines common settings for all candlestick series.

color.Description: Specifies the color of the series.

cornerRadius.Description: Makes bars look rounded. Applies only to bar-like series.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies the dash style of the series line. Applies only to line-like series.

fullstackedarea.Description: Defines common settings for all full-stacked area series.

fullstackedspline.Description: Defines common settings for all full-stacked spline series.

highValueField.Description: Specifies which data source field provides high values for points of a financial series.

hoverMode.Description: Specifies series elements to be highlighted when a user points to a series.

hoverStyle.Description: Configures the appearance adopted by the series when a user points to it.

border.Description: Configures the appearance adopted by the series border (in area-like series) or the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series) when a user points to the series.

color.Description: Colors the series border (in area-like series) or the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series) when a user points to the series.

Specifies the pixel-measured width of the series line when the series is in the hovered state.

font.Description: Specifies font options for point labels.

format.Description: Formats the point value before it will be displayed in the point label.

horizontalOffset.Description: Along with verticalOffset, shifts point labels from their initial positions.

position.Description: Specifies whether to display point labels inside or outside of series points. Applies only to bubble, range-like and bar-like series.

showForZeroValues.Description: Specifies whether or not to show labels for points with zero value. Applies only to bar-like series.

verticalOffset.Description: Along with horizontalOffset, shifts point labels from their initial positions.

visible.Description: Makes the point labels visible.

line.Description: Defines common settings for all line series.

lowValueField.Description: Specifies which data source field provides low values for points of a financial series.

maxLabelCount.Description: Specifies a limit for the number of point labels.

minBarSize.Description: Specifies the minimal possible height (or length if the chart is rotated) of a bar in pixels. Applies only to bar-like series.

opacity.Description: Specifies how transparent the series should be.

openValueField.Description: Specifies which data source field provides open values for points of a financial series.

pane.Description: Specifies which pane the series should belong to. Accepts the name of the pane.

point.Description: Configures series points in scatter, line- and area-like series.

border.Description: Configures the appearance of the series point border in scatter, line- and area-like series.

color.Description: Colors the border.

visible.Description: Makes the border visible.

width.Description: Sets the width of the border in pixels.

color.Description: Colors the series points.

hoverMode.Description: Specifies series elements to be highlighted when a user pauses on a series point.

hoverStyle.Description: Configures the appearance adopted by a series point when a user pauses on it.

border.Description: Configures the appearance of the point border when a user pauses on the point.

color.Description: Specifies the color of the point border when the point is in the hovered state.

visible.Description: Makes the border visible when a user pauses on the series point.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the point border when the point is in the hovered state.

color.Description: Specifies the color of series points in the hovered state.

size.Description: Specfies the diameter of series points in the hovered state.

image.Description: Substitutes the standard point symbols with an image.

height.Description: Specifies the height of the image used instead of a point marker.

rangeMaxPoint.Description: Specifies the height of the image that represents the maximum point in a range area series.

rangeMinPoint.Description: Specifies the height of the image that represents the minimum point in a range area series.

url.Description: Specifies the URL of the image to be used as a point marker.

rangeMaxPoint.Description: Specifies the URL of the image to be used as a maximum point marker.

rangeMinPoint.Description: Specifies the URL of the image to be used as a maximum point marker.

width.Description: Specifies the width of an image that is used as a point marker.

rangeMaxPoint.Description: Specifies the width of the image that represents the maximum point in a range area series.

rangeMinPoint.Description: Specifies the width of the image that represents the minimum point in a range area series.

selectionMode.Description: Specifies series elements to be highlighted when a user selects a series point.

selectionStyle.Description: Configures the appearance of a selected series point.

border.Description: Configures the border of a selected point.

color.Description: Specifies the color of the point border when the point is selected.

visible.Description: Makes the border of a selected point visible.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the point border when the point is selected.

color.Description: Specifies the color of series points in the selected state.

size.Description: Specfies the diameter of series points in the selected state.
Specifies the diameter of series points in pixels.

symbol.Description: Specifies which symbol should represent series points in scatter, line- and area-like series.

visible.Description: Makes the series points visible.

rangearea.Description: Defines common settings for all range area series.

rangebar.Description: Defines common settings for all range bar series.

rangeValue1Field.Description: Coupled with the rangeValue2Field option, specifies which data source field provides values for a range-like series.

rangeValue2Field.Description: Coupled with the rangeValue1Field option, specifies which data source field provides values for a range-like series.

reduction.Description: Specifies reduction options for financial series.

color.Description: Specifies a color for the points whose price has decreased in comparison to the price of the previous point.

level.Description: Specifies whether high, low, open or close prices of points should be compared.

scatter.Description: Defines common settings for all scatter series.

selectionMode.Description: Specifies series elements to be highlighted when a user selects a series.

selectionStyle.Description: Configures the appearance adopted by the series when a user selects it.

border.Description: Configures the appearance adopted by the series border (in area-like series) or the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series) when a user selects the series.

color.Description: Colors the series border (in area-like series) or the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series) when a user selects the series.

dashStyle.Description: Sets a dash style for the series border (in area-like series) or for the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series) when a user selects the series.

visible.Description: Shows the series border (in area-like series) or the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series) when a user selects the series.

width.Description: Sets a pixel-measured width for the series border (in area-like series) or for the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series) when a user selects the series.

color.Description: Specifies the color of the series in the selected state.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies the dash style of the series line when the series is in the selected state. Applies only to line-like series.

hatching.Description: Configures hatching that applies when a user selects the series.

direction.Description: Specifies the direction of hatching lines.

opacity.Description: Specifies how transparent hatching lines should be.

step.Description: Specifies the distance between two side-by-side hatching lines in pixels.

width.Description: Specifies the width of hatching lines in pixels.
Specifies the pixel-measured width of the series line when the series is in the selected state.

showInLegend.Description: Specifies whether to show the series in the legend or not.

sizeField.Description: Specifies which data source field provides size values for bubbles. Required by and applies only to bubble series.

spline.Description: Defines common settings for all spline series.

splinearea.Description: Defines common settings for all spline area series.

stack.Description: Specifies which stack the series should belongs to. Applies only to stacked bar and full-stacked bar series.

stackedarea.Description: Defines common settings for all stacked area series.

stackedbar.Description: Defines common settings for all stacked bar series.

stackedline.Description: Defines common settings for all stacked line series.

stackedspline.Description: Defines common settings for all stacked spline series.

stackedsplinearea.Description: Defines common settings for all stacked spline area series.

steparea.Description: Defines common settings for all step area series.

stepline.Description: Defines common settings for all step line series.

stock.Description: Defines common settings for all stock series.

tagField.Description: Specifies which data source field provides auxiliary data for series points.

type.Description: Specifies the type of the series.

color.Description: Specifies the color of error bars.

displayMode.Description: Specifies whether error bars must be displayed in full or partially.

edgeLength.Description: Specifies the length of the lines that indicate the error bar edges.

highValueField.Description: Specifies which data field provides high error values.

lineWidth.Description: Specifies the width of the error bar line.

lowValueField.Description: Specifies which data field provides low error values.

opacity.Description: Specifies how trasparent error bars should be.

type.Description: Specifies how error bar values must be calculated.

value.Description: Specifies the value to be used for generating error bars.

valueField.Description: Specifies which data source field provides values for series points.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the series is visible or not.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the series line in pixels. Applies only to line-like series.

ChartSeries.Description: Specifies options for Chart widget series.

aggregation.Description: Configures data aggregation for the series.

calculate.Description: Specifies a custom aggregate function. Applies only if the aggregation method is "custom".

enabled.Description: Enables data aggregation for the series.

method.Description: Specifies how to aggregate series points.

argumentField.Description: Specifies which data source field provides arguments for series points.

axis.Description: Binds the series to a value axis.

barPadding.Description: Controls the padding and consequently the width of all bars in a series using relative units. Ignored if the barWidth option is set.

barWidth.Description: Specifies a fixed width for all bars in a series, measured in pixels. Takes precedence over the barPadding option.

border.Description: Configures the series border (in area-like series) or the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series).

color.Description: Colors the series border (in area-like series) or the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series).

width.Description: Sets a pixel-measured width for the series border (in area-like series) or for the series point border (in bar-like and bubble series).

closeValueField.Description: Specifies which data source field provides close values for points of a financial series.

CompareRule.Description: A validation rule that demands that a validated editor has a value that is equal to a specified expression.

comparisonTarget.Description: Specifies the function whose return value is used for comparison with the validated value.

comparisonType.Description: Specifies the operator to be used for comparing the validated value with the target.

message.Description: Specifies the message that is shown for end-users if the current rule is broken.

reevaluate.Description: Indicates whether or not the rule should be always checked for the target value or only when the target value changes.

type.Description: Specifies the type of the current rule.

CustomRule.Description: A validation rule with custom validation logic.

message.Description: Specifies the message that is shown for end-users if the current rule is broken.

reevaluate.Description: Indicates whether the rule should be always checked for the target value or only when the target value changes.

type.Description: Specifies the type of the current rule.

validationCallback.Description: A function that validates the target value.

ContextMenuItem.Description: This section lists the data source fields that are used in a default item template.

beginGroup.Description: Specifies whether a group separator is displayed over the item.

closeMenuOnClick.Description: Specifies if a menu is closed when a user clicks the item.

disabled.Description: Specifies whether or not the menu item is disabled.

icon.Description: The name of an icon to be displayed on the menu item.

items.Description: Holds an array of menu items.

selectable.Description: Specifies whether or not a user can select a menu item.

selected.Description: Specifies whether or not the item is selected.

template.Description: Specifies an item template that should be used to render this item only.

text.Description: Specifies the text inserted into the item element.

visible.Description: Specifies whether or not the menu item is visible.

alignment.Description: Aligns the content of the column.

allowEditing.Description: Specifies whether a user can edit values in the column at runtime. By default, inherits the value of the editing.allowUpdating option.

allowExporting.Description: Specifies whether data from this column should be exported.

allowFiltering.Description: Specifies whether data can be filtered by this column. Applies only if filterRow.visible is true.

allowFixing.Description: Specifies whether a user can fix the column at runtime. Applies only if columnFixing.enabled is true.

allowGrouping.Description: Specifies whether the user can group data by values of this column. Applies only when grouping is enabled.

allowHeaderFiltering.Description: Specifies whether the header filter can be used to filter data by this column. Applies only if headerFilter.visible is true. By default, inherits the value of the allowFiltering option.

allowHiding.Description: Specifies whether a user can hide the column using the column chooser at runtime. Applies only if columnChooser.enabled is true.

allowReordering.Description: Specifies whether this column can be used in column reordering at runtime. Applies only if allowColumnReordering is true.

allowResizing.Description: Specifies whether a user can resize the column at runtime. Applies only if allowColumnResizing is true.

allowSearch.Description: Specifies whether this column can be searched. Applies only if searchPanel.visible is true. Inherits the value of the allowFiltering option by default.

allowSorting.Description: Specifies whether a user can sort rows by this column at runtime. Applies only if sorting.mode differs from "none".

autoExpandGroup.Description: Specifies whether groups appear expanded or not when records are grouped by a specific column. Setting this option makes sense only when grouping is allowed for this column.

calculateCellValue.Description: Calculates custom values for column cells.

calculateDisplayValue.Description: Calculates custom display values for column cells. Used when display values should differ from values for editing.

calculateFilterExpression.Description: Specifies the column's custom filtering rules.

calculateGroupValue.Description: Specifies a field name or a function that returns a field name or a value to be used for grouping column cells.

calculateSortValue.Description: Calculates custom values to be used in sorting.

caption.Description: Specifies a caption for the column.

cellTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for column cells.

cssClass.Description: Specifies a CSS class to be applied to the column.

customizeText.Description: Customizes the text displayed in column cells.

dataField.Description: Binds the column to a field of the dataSource.

dataType.Description: Casts column values to a specific data type.

editCellTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for column cells in the editing state.

editorOptions.Description: Specifies options for the underlain editor.

encodeHtml.Description: Specifies whether HTML tags are displayed as plain text or applied to the values of the column.

falseText.Description: In a boolean column, replaces all false items with a specified text. Applies only if showEditorAlways option is false.

filterOperations.Description: Specifies a set of available filter operations. Applies only if filterRow.visible and allowFiltering are true.

filterType.Description: Specifies whether a user changes the current filter by including (selecting) or excluding (clearing the selection of) values. Applies only if headerFilter.visible and allowHeaderFiltering are true.

filterValue.Description: Specifies a filter value for the column.

filterValues.Description: Specifies filter values for the column's header filter.

fixedPosition.Description: Specifies the widget's edge to which the column is fixed. Applies only if columns].[fixed is true.

format.Description: Formats a value before it is displayed in a column cell.

formItem.Description: Configures the form item produced by this column in the editing state. Used only if editing.mode is "form" or "popup".

groupCellTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for group cells.

groupIndex.Description: Specifies the index of a column when grid records are grouped by the values of this column.

headerCellTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for column headers.

headerFilter.Description: Specifies data settings for the header filter.

allowSearch.Description: Specifies whether searching is enabled in the header filter.

dataSource.Description: Specifies a data source for the header filter.

groupInterval.Description: Specifies how the header filter combines values into groups.

height.Description: Specifies the height of the popup menu containing filtering values.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the popup menu containing filtering values.

hidingPriority.Description: Specifies the order in which columns are hidden when the widget adapts to the screen or container size. Ignored if allowColumnResizing is true and columnResizingMode is "widget".

isBand.Description: Specifies whether the column bands other columns or not.

lookup.Description: Specifies options of a lookup column.

allowClearing.Description: Specifies whether a user can nullify values of the lookup column.

dataSource.Description: Specifies the data source for the lookup column.

displayExpr.Description: Specifies the data source field whose values must be displayed.

valueExpr.Description: Specifies the data source field whose values must be replaced.

minWidth.Description: Specifies the minimum width of the column.

name.Description: Specifies the identifier of the column.

ownerBand.Description: Specifies the band column that owns the current column. Accepts the index of the band column in the columns array.

selectedFilterOperation.Description: Specifies the selected filter operation for the column.

setCellValue.Description: Specifies a function to be invoked after the user has edited a cell value, but before it will be saved in the data source.

showEditorAlways.Description: Specifies whether the column displays its values using editors.

showInColumnChooser.Description: Specifies whether the column chooser can contain the column header.

showWhenGrouped.Description: Specifies whether or not to display the column when grid records are grouped by it.

sortIndex.Description: Specifies the index according to which columns participate in sorting.

sortingMethod.Description: Specifies a custom comparison function for sorting. Applies only when sorting is performed on the client.

sortOrder.Description: Specifies the sort order of column values.

trueText.Description: In a boolean column, replaces all true items with a specified text. Applies only if showEditorAlways option is false.

validationRules.Description: Specifies validation rules to be checked on updating cell values.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the column is visible, that is, occupies space in the table.

visibleIndex.Description: Specifies the position of the column regarding other columns in the resulting widget.

width.Description: Specifies the column's width in pixels or as a percentage. Ignored if it is less than minWidth.

calculateFilterExpression.Description: Specifies a function that returns a filter expression for this custom operation.

customizeText.Description: Customizes the field value's text representation.

dataTypes.Description: Specifies for which data types the operation is available by default.

editorTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for the widget used to edit the field value.

hasValue.Description: Specifies whether the operation can have a value. If it can, the editor is displayed.

icon.Description: Specifies an icon that represents the operation. Accepts the name of an icon from the built-in icon library, a path to an image, or the CSS class of an icon stored in an external icon library.

name.Description: Specifies the operation's identifier.

calculateFilterExpression.Description: Specifies the field's custom filtering rules.

customizeText.Description: Customizes the input value's display text.

dataField.Description: Specifies the name of a field to be filtered.

dataType.Description: Casts field values to a specific data type.

editorOptions.Description: Configures the widget used to edit the field value.

falseText.Description: Specifies the false value text. Applies only if dataType is "boolean".

filterOperations.Description: Specifies a set of available filter operations.

format.Description: Formats a value before it is displayed.

allowClearing.Description: Specifies whether a user can nullify the lookup values. Set to true only if your data source accepts null values.

dataSource.Description: Specifies the lookup data source.

displayExpr.Description: Specifies the data source field whose values are displayed.

valueExpr.Description: Specifies the data source field whose values should be replaced.

trueText.Description: Specifies the true value text. Applies only if dataType is "boolean".

colSpan.Description: Specifies how many columns the item spans.

cssClass.Description: Specifies a CSS class to be applied to the item.

itemType.Description: Specifies the item's type. Set it to "button" to create a button item.

name.Description: Specifies the item's identifier.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the item is visible.

visibleIndex.Description: Specifies the item's position regarding other items in a group, tab, or the whole widget.

FormEmptyItem.Description: This article describes configuration options of an empty form item.

colSpan.Description: Specifies the number of columns spanned by the item.

cssClass.Description: Specifies a CSS class to be applied to the form item.

itemType.Description: Specifies the item's type. Set it to "empty" to create an empty item.

name.Description: Specifies a name that identifies the form item.

visible.Description: Specifies whether or not the current form item is visible.

visibleIndex.Description: Specifies the sequence number of the item in a form, group or tab.

FormGroupItem.Description: This article describes configuration options of a group form item.

alignItemLabels.Description: Specifies whether or not all group item labels are aligned.

colCount.Description: The count of columns in the group layout.

colCountByScreen.Description: Specifies dependency between the screen factor and the count of columns in the group layout.

lg.Description: The count of columns for a large screen size.

md.Description: The count of columns for a middle-sized screen.

sm.Description: The count of columns for a small-sized screen.

xs.Description: The count of columns for an extra small-sized screen.

colSpan.Description: Specifies the number of columns spanned by the item.

cssClass.Description: Specifies a CSS class to be applied to the form item.

items.Description: Holds an array of form items displayed within the group.

itemType.Description: Specifies the item's type. Set it to "group" to create a group item.

name.Description: Specifies a name that identifies the form item.

template.Description: A template to be used for rendering a group item.

visible.Description: Specifies whether or not the current form item is visible.

visibleIndex.Description: Specifies the sequence number of the item in a form, group or tab.

FormSimpleItem.Description: This article describes configuration options of a simple form item.

colSpan.Description: Specifies the number of columns spanned by the item.

cssClass.Description: Specifies a CSS class to be applied to the form item.

dataField.Description: Specifies the path to the formData object field bound to the current form item.

editorOptions.Description: Specifies configuration options for the editor widget of the current form item.

editorType.Description: Specifies which editor widget is used to display and edit the form item value.

helpText.Description: Specifies the help text displayed for the current form item.

isRequired.Description: Specifies whether the current form item is required.

itemType.Description: Specifies the item's type. Set it to "simple" to create a simple item.

label.Description: Specifies options for the form item label.

location.Description: Specifies the location of a label against the editor.

showColon.Description: Specifies whether or not a colon is displayed at the end of the current label.

text.Description: Specifies the label text.

visible.Description: Specifies whether or not the label is visible.

name.Description: Specifies a name that identifies the form item.

template.Description: A template to be used for rendering the form item.

validationRules.Description: An array of validation rules to be checked for the form item editor.

visible.Description: Specifies whether or not the current form item is visible.

visibleIndex.Description: Specifies the sequence number of the item in a form, group or tab.

FormTabbedItem.Description: This article describes configuration options of a tabbed form item.

colSpan.Description: Specifies the number of columns spanned by the item.

cssClass.Description: Specifies a CSS class to be applied to the form item.

itemType.Description: Specifies the item's type. Set it to "tabbed" to create a tabbed item.

name.Description: Specifies a name that identifies the form item.

tabPanelOptions.Description: Holds a configuration object for the TabPanel widget used to display the current form item.

tabs.Description: An array of tab configuration objects.

alignItemLabels.Description: Specifies whether or not labels of items displayed within the current tab are aligned.

badge.Description: Specifies a badge text for the tab.

colCount.Description: The count of columns in the tab layout.

colCountByScreen.Description: Specifies dependency between the screen factor and the count of columns in the tab layout.

lg.Description: The count of columns for a large screen size.

md.Description: The count of columns for a middle-sized screen.

sm.Description: The count of columns for a small-sized screen.

xs.Description: The count of columns for an extra small-sized screen.

disabled.Description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the tab can respond to user interaction.

icon.Description: Specifies the icon to be displayed on the tab.

items.Description: Holds an array of form items displayed within the tab.

tabTemplate.Description: The template to be used for rendering the tab.

template.Description: The template to be used for rendering the tab content.

visible.Description: Specifies whether or not the current form item is visible.

visibleIndex.Description: Specifies the sequence number of the item in a form, group or tab.

MenuItem.Description: This section lists the data source fields that are used in a default item template.

beginGroup.Description: Specifies whether a group separator is displayed over the item.

closeMenuOnClick.Description: Specifies if a menu is closed when a user clicks the item.

disabled.Description: Specifies whether or not the menu item is disabled.

icon.Description: The name of an icon to be displayed on the menu item.

items.Description: Holds an array of menu items.

selectable.Description: Specifies whether or not a user can select a menu item.

selected.Description: Specifies whether or not the item is selected.

template.Description: Specifies an item template that should be used to render this item only.

text.Description: Specifies the text inserted into the item element.

visible.Description: Specifies whether or not the menu item is visible.

alignment.Description: Aligns the content of the column.

allowEditing.Description: Specifies whether a user can edit values in the column at runtime. By default, inherits the value of the editing.allowUpdating option.

allowFiltering.Description: Specifies whether data can be filtered by this column. Applies only if filterRow.visible is true.

allowFixing.Description: Specifies whether a user can fix the column at runtime. Applies only if columnFixing.enabled is true.

allowHeaderFiltering.Description: Specifies whether the header filter can be used to filter data by this column. Applies only if headerFilter.visible is true. By default, inherits the value of the allowFiltering option.

allowHiding.Description: Specifies whether a user can hide the column using the column chooser at runtime. Applies only if columnChooser.enabled is true.

allowReordering.Description: Specifies whether this column can be used in column reordering at runtime. Applies only if allowColumnReordering is true.

allowResizing.Description: Specifies whether a user can resize the column at runtime. Applies only if allowColumnResizing is true.

allowSearch.Description: Specifies whether this column can be searched. Applies only if searchPanel.visible is true. Inherits the value of the allowFiltering option by default.

allowSorting.Description: Specifies whether a user can sort rows by this column at runtime. Applies only if sorting.mode differs from "none".

calculateCellValue.Description: Calculates custom values for column cells.

calculateDisplayValue.Description: Calculates custom display values for column cells. Used when display values should differ from values for editing.

calculateFilterExpression.Description: Specifies the column's custom filtering rules.

calculateSortValue.Description: Calculates custom values to be used in sorting.

caption.Description: Specifies a caption for the column.

cellTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for column cells.

cssClass.Description: Specifies a CSS class to be applied to the column.

customizeText.Description: Customizes the text displayed in column cells.

dataField.Description: Binds the column to a field of the dataSource.

dataType.Description: Casts column values to a specific data type.

editCellTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for column cells in the editing state.

editorOptions.Description: Specifies options for the underlain editor.

encodeHtml.Description: Specifies whether HTML tags are displayed as plain text or applied to the values of the column.

falseText.Description: In a boolean column, replaces all false items with a specified text. Applies only if showEditorAlways option is false.

filterOperations.Description: Specifies a set of available filter operations. Applies only if filterRow.visible and allowFiltering are true.

filterType.Description: Specifies whether a user changes the current filter by including (selecting) or excluding (clearing the selection of) values. Applies only if headerFilter.visible and allowHeaderFiltering are true.

filterValue.Description: Specifies a filter value for the column.

filterValues.Description: Specifies filter values for the column's header filter.

fixedPosition.Description: Specifies the widget's edge to which the column is fixed. Applies only if columns].[fixed is true.

format.Description: Formats a value before it is displayed in a column cell.

formItem.Description: Configures the form item produced by this column in the editing state. Used only if editing.mode is "form" or "popup".

headerCellTemplate.Description: Specifies a custom template for column headers.

headerFilter.Description: Specifies data settings for the header filter.

allowSearch.Description: Specifies whether searching is enabled in the header filter.

dataSource.Description: Specifies a data source for the header filter.

groupInterval.Description: Specifies how the header filter combines values into groups.

height.Description: Specifies the height of the popup menu containing filtering values.

width.Description: Specifies the width of the popup menu containing filtering values.

hidingPriority.Description: Specifies the order in which columns are hidden when the widget adapts to the screen or container size. Ignored if allowColumnResizing is true and columnResizingMode is "widget".

isBand.Description: Specifies whether the column bands other columns or not.

lookup.Description: Specifies options of a lookup column.

allowClearing.Description: Specifies whether a user can nullify values of the lookup column.

dataSource.Description: Specifies the data source for the lookup column.

displayExpr.Description: Specifies the data source field whose values must be displayed.

valueExpr.Description: Specifies the data source field whose values must be replaced.

minWidth.Description: Specifies the minimum width of the column.

name.Description: Specifies the identifier of the column.

ownerBand.Description: Specifies the band column that owns the current column. Accepts the index of the band column in the columns array.

selectedFilterOperation.Description: Specifies the selected filter operation for the column.

setCellValue.Description: Specifies a function to be invoked after the user has edited a cell value, but before it will be saved in the data source.

showEditorAlways.Description: Specifies whether the column displays its values using editors.

showInColumnChooser.Description: Specifies whether the column chooser can contain the column header.

sortIndex.Description: Specifies the index according to which columns participate in sorting.

sortingMethod.Description: Specifies a custom comparison function for sorting. Applies only when sorting is performed on the client.

sortOrder.Description: Specifies the sort order of column values.

trueText.Description: In a boolean column, replaces all true items with a specified text. Applies only if showEditorAlways option is false.

validationRules.Description: Specifies validation rules to be checked on updating cell values.

visible.Description: Specifies whether the column is visible, that is, occupies space in the table.

visibleIndex.Description: Specifies the position of the column regarding other columns in the resulting widget.

width.Description: Specifies the column's width in pixels or as a percentage. Ignored if it is less than minWidth.

TreeViewItem.Description: This section lists the data source fields that are used in a default item template.

disabled.Description: Specifies whether or not a widget item must be displayed disabled.

expanded.Description: Specifies whether or not the tree view item is displayed expanded.

hasItems.Description: Specifies whether or not the tree view item has children.

html.Description: Specifies html code inserted into the widget item element.

icon.Description: The name of an icon to be displayed on the tree view item.

items.Description: Holds an array of tree view items.

parentId.Description: Holds the key of the parent item.

selected.Description: Specifies whether or not the tree view item is displayed selected.

template.Description: Specifies an item template that should be used to render this item only.

text.Description: Specifies text displayed for the widget item.

visible.Description: Specifies whether or not a widget item must be displayed.

EmailRule.Description: A validation rule that demands that the validated field match the Email pattern.

message.Description: Specifies the message that is shown for end-users if the current rule is broken.

type.Description: Specifies the type of the current rule.

color.Description: Specifies a font color.

opacity.Description: Specifies a font opacity.

size.Description: Specifies a font size.

currency.Description: Specifies the currency code. Applies only if type is "currency".

parser.Description: Parses string values into numeric or date-time values. Can be used with formatter or one of the predefined formats.

precision.Description: Specifies a precision for values of a numeric format.

type.Description: Specifies a predefined format. Does not apply if you have specified the formatter function.

GaugeIndicator.Description: An object that defines a gauge indicator of the rectangleNeedle type.

arrowLength.Description: Specifies the length of an arrow for the indicator of the textCloud type in pixels.

backgroundColor.Description: Specifies the background color for the indicator of the rangeBar type.

baseValue.Description: Specifies the base value for the indicator of the rangeBar type.

beginAdaptingAtRadius.Description: Specifies a radius small enough for the indicator to begin adapting.

color.Description: Specifies a color of the indicator.

horizontalOrientation.Description: Specifies the orientation of the rangeBar indicator. Applies only if the geometry.orientation option is "vertical".

indentFromCenter.Description: Specifies the distance between the needle and the center of a gauge for the indicator of a needle-like type.

offset.Description: Specifies the distance between the indicator and the invisible scale line.

palette.Description: Sets the palette to be used to colorize indicators differently.

secondColor.Description: Specifies the second color for the indicator of the twoColorNeedle type.

secondFraction.Description: Specifies the length of a twoNeedleColor type indicator tip as a percentage.

size.Description: Specifies the range bar size for an indicator of the rangeBar type.

spindleGapSize.Description: Specifies the inner diameter in pixels, so that the spindle has the shape of a ring.

spindleSize.Description: Specifies the spindle's diameter in pixels for the indicator of a needle-like type.

text.Description: Specifies the appearance of the text displayed in an indicator of the rangeBar type.

customizeText.Description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed in an indicator.

font.Description: Specifies font options for the text displayed by the indicator.

format.Description: Formats a value before it is displayed in an indicator. Accepts only numeric formats.

indent.Description: Specifies the range bar's label indent in pixels.

verticalOrientation.Description: Specifies the orientation of the rangeBar indicator. Applies only if the geometry.orientation option is "horizontal".

width.Description: Specifies the width of an indicator in pixels.

NumericRule.Description: A validation rule that demands that the validated field has a numeric value.

message.Description: Specifies the message that is shown for end-users if the current rule is broken.

type.Description: Specifies the type of the current rule.

PatternRule.Description: A validation rule that demands that the validated field match a specified pattern.

message.Description: Specifies the message that is shown for end-users if the current rule is broken.

pattern.Description: Specifies the regular expression that the validated value must match.

type.Description: Specifies the type of the current rule.

argumentField.Description: Specifies the data source field that provides arguments for series points.

barPadding.Description: Controls the padding and consequently the angular width of all bars in a series using relative units. Ignored if the barWidth option is set.

barWidth.Description: Specifies a fixed angular width for all bars in a series, measured in degrees. Takes precedence over the barPadding option.

border.Description: An object defining the series border configuration options.

color.Description: Sets a border color for a series.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies a dash style for the borders of series points.

visible.Description: Sets border visibility for a series.

width.Description: Sets a border width for a series in pixels.

closed.Description: Specifies whether or not to close the chart by joining the end point with the first point.

color.Description: Specifies a series color.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies the dash style of the series' line.

hoverMode.Description: Specifies the series elements to highlight when a series is hovered over.

hoverStyle.Description: An object defining configuration options for a hovered series.

border.Description: An object defining the border options for a hovered series.

color.Description: Sets a border color for a hovered series.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies a dash style for the borders of point labels.

visible.Description: Sets a border visibility for a hovered series.

width.Description: Sets a border width for a hovered series.

color.Description: Sets a color for a series when it is hovered over.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies the dash style for the line in a hovered series.

hatching.Description: Specifies the hatching options to be applied when a series is hovered over.

direction.Description: Specifies how to apply hatching to highlight the hovered series.

opacity.Description: Specifies the opacity of hatching lines.

step.Description: Specifies the distance between hatching lines in pixels.

width.Description: Specifies the width of hatching lines in pixels.
Specifies the width of a line in a hovered series.

ignoreEmptyPoints.Description: Specifies whether a chart ignores null data points or not.

label.Description: An object defining the label configuration options.

argumentFormat.Description: Formats the point argument before it is displayed in the point label. To format the point value, use the format option.

backgroundColor.Description: Specifies a background color for point labels.

border.Description: Specifies border options for point labels.

color.Description: Specifies a border color for point labels.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies a dash style for the borders of point labels.

visible.Description: Indicates whether borders are visible in point labels.

width.Description: Specifies the border width for point labels.

connector.Description: Specifies connector options for series point labels.

color.Description: Specifies the color of label connectors.

visible.Description: Indicates whether or not label connectors are visible.

width.Description: Specifies the width of label connectors.

customizeText.Description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed by point labels.

font.Description: Specifies font options for the text displayed in point labels.

format.Description: Formats a value before it is displayed in a point label.

position.Description: Specifies a label position in bar-like series.

rotationAngle.Description: Specifies the angle used to rotate point labels from their initial position.

showForZeroValues.Description: Specifies whether or not to show a label when the point has a zero value.

visible.Description: Specifies the visibility of point labels.

maxLabelCount.Description: Specifies how many points are acceptable to be in a series to display all labels for these points. Otherwise, the labels will not be displayed.

minBarSize.Description: Specifies the minimal length of a displayed bar in pixels.

name.Description: Specifies the name that identifies the series.

opacity.Description: Specifies opacity for a series.

point.Description: An object defining configuration options for points in line and area series.

border.Description: Specifies border options for points in the line and area series.

color.Description: Sets a border color for points in the line and area series.

visible.Description: Sets border visibility for points in the line and area series.

width.Description: Sets a border width for points in the line or area series.

color.Description: Specifies the points color.

hoverMode.Description: Specifies what series points to highlight when a point is hovered over.

hoverStyle.Description: An object defining configuration options for a hovered point.

border.Description: An object defining the border options for a hovered point.

color.Description: Sets a border color for a hovered point.

visible.Description: Sets border visibility for a hovered point.

width.Description: Sets a border width for a hovered point.

color.Description: Sets a color for a point when it is hovered over.

size.Description: Specifies the diameter of a hovered point in the series that represents data points as symbols (not as bars for instance).

image.Description: An object specifying the parameters of an image that is used as a point marker.

height.Description: Specifies the height of an image that is used as a point marker.

url.Description: Specifies a URL leading to the image to be used as a point marker.

width.Description: Specifies the width of an image that is used as a point marker.

selectionMode.Description: Specifies what series points to highlight when a point is selected.

selectionStyle.Description: An object defining configuration options for a selected point.

border.Description: An object defining the border options for a selected point.

color.Description: Sets a border color for a selected point.

visible.Description: Sets border visibility for a selected point.

width.Description: Sets a border width for a selected point.

color.Description: Sets a color for a point when it is selected.

size.Description: Specifies the diameter of a selected point in the series that represents data points as symbols (not as bars for instance).
Specifies the point diameter in pixels for those series that represent data points as symbols (not as bars for instance).

symbol.Description: Specifies a symbol for presenting points of the line and area series.

visible.Description: Specifies the points visibility for a line and area series.

selectionMode.Description: Specifies the series elements to highlight when the series is selected.

selectionStyle.Description: An object defining configuration options for a selected series.

border.Description: An object defining the border options for a selected series.

color.Description: Sets a border color for a selected series.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies a dash style for the borders of point labels.

visible.Description: Sets border visibility for a selected series.

width.Description: Sets a border width for a selected series.

color.Description: Sets a color for a series when it is selected.

dashStyle.Description: Specifies the dash style for the line in a selected series.

hatching.Description: Specifies the hatching options to be applied when a series is selected.

direction.Description: Specifies how to apply hatching to highlight a selected series.

opacity.Description: Specifies the opacity of hatching lines.

step.Description: Specifies the distance between hatching lines in pixels.

width.Description: Specifies the width of hatching lines in pixels.
Specifies the width of a line in a selected series.

showInLegend.Description: Specifies whether or not to show the series in the chart's legend.

stack.Description: Specifies the name of the stack where the values of the 'stackedBar' series must be located.

tagField.Description: Specifies the name of the data source field that provides data about a point.

type.Description: Sets the series type.

color.Description: Specifies the color of error bars.

displayMode.Description: Specifies whether error bars must be displayed in full or partially.

edgeLength.Description: Specifies the length of the lines that indicate the error bar edges.

highValueField.Description: Specifies the data field that provides data for high error values.

lineWidth.Description: Specifies the width of the error bar line.

lowValueField.Description: Specifies the data field that provides data for low error values.

opacity.Description: Specifies the opacity of error bars.

type.Description: Specifies how error bar values must be calculated.

value.Description: Specifies the value to be used for generating error bars.

valueField.Description: Specifies the data source field that provides values for series points.

visible.Description: Specifies the visibility of a series.

width.Description: Specifies a line width.

PositionConfig.Description: The position object specifies the widget positioning options.

at.Description: The target element position that the widget is positioned against.

boundary.Description: The element within which the widget is positioned.

boundaryOffset.Description: Specifies the horizontal and vertical offset from the window's boundaries.

collision.Description: Specifies how to move the widget if it overflows the screen.

my.Description: The position of the widget to align against the target element.

of.Description: The target element that the widget is positioned against.

offset.Description: Specifies horizontal and vertical offset in pixels.

RangeRule.Description: A validation rule that demands the target value be within the specified value range (including the range's end points).

max.Description: Specifies the maximum value allowed for the validated value.

message.Description: Specifies the message that is shown to end-users if the current rule is broken.

min.Description: Specifies the minimum value allowed for the validated value.

reevaluate.Description: Indicates whether the rule should be always checked for the target value or only when the target value changes.

type.Description: Specifies the type of the current rule.

RequiredRule.Description: A validation rule that demands that a validated field has a value.

message.Description: Specifies the message that is shown for end-users if the current rule is broken.

trim.Description: Indicates whether to remove the Space characters from the validated value.

type.Description: Specifies the type of the current rule.

StringLengthRule.Description: A validation rule that demands the target value length be within the specified value range (including the range's end points).

max.Description: Specifies the maximum length allowed for the validated value.

message.Description: Specifies the message that is shown for end-users if the current rule is broken.

min.Description: Specifies the minimum length allowed for the validated value.

trim.Description: Indicates whether or not to remove the Space characters from the validated value.

type.Description: Specifies the type of the current rule.
